actions.text: Whitfield amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment is inserted after line 17 instead of line 8 on page 12 of the bill.
On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A001) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 300 (Roll no. 411).

description: Amendment sought to increase the individual contribution limit from $1,000 to $3,000.
purpose: An amendment no. 1 printed in H. Rept. 106-311 to increase the individual contribution limit from $1,000 to $3,000.
